channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8307778] com/sun/jdi/cds tests fail with jtreg's Virtual test thread factory
item.description:
Tests
com/sun/jdi/cds/CDSBreakpointTest.java
com/sun/jdi/cds/CDSDeleteAllBkptsTest.java
com/sun/jdi/cds/CDSFieldWatchpoints.java

use custom class paths and archives and fail when run with thread test factory with

item.summary: com/sun/jdi/cds tests fail with jtreg's Virtual test thread factory

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fix request [21u]

I backport this for parity with 21.0.5-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/776
Date: 2024-06-21 08:13:30 +0000

Changeset: fe8a2aff
Author: Jaikiran Pai <jpai@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-05-16 05:42:38 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/fe8a2aff3129b515c2a0f3ab96f5e3ad6cef7b70

A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/19244
Date: 2024-05-15 05:59:56 +0000

[~lmesnik] Can you elaborate a bit more the root cause of this failure and explain what changed in JDK-8307307 to cause it? I'm trying to determine if this is something that can be fixed, or if the tests are just inherently incompatible with the virtual thread test factory.
The tests passed before 8307307 just before property that run Virtual Thread was not set into processTools.
